author: Dennis Desrochers
comment: When scrolling, it repeats articles radomly.  Annoying.  Also, app will close often and require a restart.

author: Jeff Massicott
comment: Very easy to use.

author: Phil Karlin
comment: Excessive pop-ups make it impossible to browse

author: Philip Perrone
comment: Very poor e-sign and service

author: Stephen Newberg
comment: Works as expected, easy to use once familiar with it

author: Betty Gehris
comment: I live in Florida 7 months of the year and use the app to get news of CT, especially the UCONN Women's basketball, as we don't get many games on TV. I enjoy the articles about the 2 towns I lived in.

author: Jorge Burgos
comment: This app used to be free now it want to charge a subscription fee is not worth a subscription fee. If i want to pay ill buy the paper version which is least expensive.

author: Robert Wheeler
comment: Tablet is my preferred way to access the Courant. The app's performance is pretty good.
title: Works fine for me

author: Mark Bettencourt
comment: Does what it is supposed to do.  Easy to navigate and to scroll through stories.
title: App

author: William Ehlers
comment: Loads pretty fast...easy to navigate
title: Great option for local news

author: Robin Clayton
comment: Can't view comments

author: Marc Reich
comment: This app makes it possible to stay connected to the state's premier newspaper and the cities and towns within it. Great source of info!
title: Great Source for State/Local Info

author: A Google User
comment: Please add the ability to be able to move the App to the SDcard. Thanks.
title: App to SDcard.

author: Matthew Pearson
comment: Too many bugs. Article scrolls back to the beginning if the screen rotates. As I read more and more articles, the app slowly grind to a halt. Breaking news articles often fail to load or say I need a subscription (I have one). Need to do better to be worth $4.99/month
title: Bugs bugs bugs

author: William Lavernoich
comment: Seems to often hang up displaying the story headlines in most categories.  Also, after opening and reading a specific story, when you click the back arrow, the index seems to back up a half dozen or more headlines.
title: Not as smooth or efficient as Courant app of four years ago.

author: Bob Laundy
comment: I keep getting notifications but when you select them they don't follow to an article or follow to a different article. Also, when reading an article it keeps jumping around. Keeps telling me I  have 10 articles or less even though I subscribe and am signed in.
title: Notifications don't link

author: betty button
comment: I think the digital format is great. Easy to navigate. Having a hard copy on Sunday works wonderfully. And I always share my paper in our housing community.
title: Good paper...great deal

author: Richard Sheldon
comment: School
title: Custodian

author: Peter Brown
comment: Every article is so-called "premium".  If you don't pay to subscribe, you cannot read any of them.....but if you browse to their website instead you can.  Brilliant.  Uninstalled.
title: Terrible

author: Tony Karlowicz
comment: I get notifications for breaking news but when I click on them it does not bring me to the story and furthermore I almost never can even find the story.
title: Fix how notifications open up stories

author: Nick Onofrio
comment: First it was free, then it was pay for "premium" articles, then 10 free articles per month, now it's 10 free total, period. Not paying to read local news. You aren't the only news source in the state.
title: Nope

author: Jazz Valle
comment: Gotta pay to read after 10 stories. Bull****
title: Horrible horrible horrible

author: Mike Lussier
comment: Loading of advertising is slowing the app to a crawl

author: Steve Brennan
comment: No indicative of a pay-for site
title: I pay for this?

author: Maria Whelden
comment: Easier to read than their digital edition.

author: Steve Cloutier
comment: Good news app

author: Valerie Walker
comment: I will be deleting this app because all of a sudden EVERY story is a "premium" story that you must pay for. Hey Hartford Courant, y'all are not the ONLY source for news...sorry to break that to you.

author: Gloria Gery
comment: Clear...complete.  wish there were color contrast on sections names.  Hard to see.
title: Good...

author: Nick McNellis
comment: I downloaded the Courant to keep in touch with my home state, however they are currently requesting more and more subscriptions to view "premium" articles. Distasteful. It's gone from 10% to close to half of the articles are now unavailable to those whom don't pay. Probably gonna start giving my support to the New Haven Register.                                                     *update: App uninstalled. Will not support their monetary agenda. I recommend all others find a more reliable source for media.
title: App is now requesting even more subscriptions

author: Melanie Gibson
comment: I used to love this app but lately i've been havin more & more problems with stories not loading & now suddenly u have to pay for it & im not gonna pay to read the news. Deleting this app now. Hartford Courant u SUCK

author: Gordon Perkins
comment: I have a subscription so that isn't an issue for me. But what is an issue is no ability to view and post comments.
title: No reader comments

author: Star Williams
comment: Now you can only read 10 stories a month lol what a job I will just stick to my news apps for FREE ✌
title: Delete uninstall so fast

author: Jonathan Lewis
comment: Why would I want to cosidered paying for stories with no information? This is not a free app. Every update gets worse.
title: Worthless.

author: Lori Perrota
comment: And I am now paying a subscription for this.
title: App crashes constantly

author: Heather Sherman
comment: It was much better when only some stories were premium. Now, they all are.
title: Ridiculous

author: Philip Pape
comment: Every article prompts for the use of premium credits, even though the same articles on the iPhone app are free.
title: No free articles

author: Jim Chagnon
comment: Loads very very very very slow since last update

author: Milan Davis
comment: Articles won't show. Used 2 and still no story or articles.
title: Premium stories

author: G Sisic
comment: Sucks! All stories are locked..

author: antwone thompson
comment: Won't even open up
